title: Correlation between sagittal balance and thoracolumbar elastic energy parameters in 42 spines subject to spondylolisthesis or spinal stenosis and 21 normal spines
content:
Publication date: 15 October 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 19

Author(s): Špela Bračun, Anna Romolo, Veronika Rehakova, Jure Leban, Žan Pukšič, Rok Vengust, Matej Daniel, Veronika Kralj-Iglič, Mitja Drab
